question: Ranee is concerned with making sure she has a set number of appointments with customers each week. Ranee is most likely being evaluated based on what?

answers.text: Percent of time spent on selling activities

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Working in the CRM is time spent at a computer.

answers.text: Percent of time spent generating leads

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Evaluation based on developing proposals would not include setting appointments with current customers each week.

answers.text: Time it takes her to develop a proposal

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. A focus on generating leads would not include meeting with current customers.

answers.text: Percent of time working in the CRM

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: Ranee needs to spend time on selling activities.

detailedSolution: Ranee needs to spend time on selling activities.
